title: The Power of Deep Listening - Part 2 (2012-03-10)
itunes:title: The Power of Deep Listening: Part 2
description: The Power of Deep Listening - Part 2 (2012-03-10) - Listening deeply is the gateway to realizing connection. It’s what allows us to move through life with a wise, loving and healing presence. These two talks explore our blocks to true listening, and offer teachings and practices that can directly cultivate this invaluable capacity.
